name: Tetris Uncloged
description:
Disentangle the wall of tetris pieces and put the pieces back where they came from.  Return two of the same piece for extra points.

CONTROLS

left mouse button: select a piece

WASD/Arrow keys: move the piece

CREDITS

Programed by Cris Martinez

Songs:

     * Hollow Moon by 1st contact (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/1st-contact/single/hollow-moon/)

Sound effects:

     * Chest piece by 180118 (https://freesound.org/people/180118/sounds/442887/#)
